text: Jeong Changhwa (; 7 July 1940 â€“ 15 February 2022) was a South Korean politician. He was a member of the Democratic Justice Party and later the Grand National Party. He was in the National Assembly from 1981 to 1992 and again from 1998 to 2004. Jeong died on 15 February 2022, at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:South Korean politicians
title: Jeong Changhwa
